transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car or a bus. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You need to use your feet to move me.
👤 One or two people can usually ride me at a time.
🛣️ You can ride me on the sidewalk or in a bike lane.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, but I'm not a train. I often take people up a mountain. What am I?

hints.text: 🚠 I hang from a cable.
🏔️ I give you a great view as you go up.
🎫 You usually need a special ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I have wings, but I'm not a bird. I take people all over the world. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I fly really high in the sky.
💺 I have lots of seats inside.
🌍 I need a runway to take off and land.

transport.question: I travel on water, but I'm not a fish. I can carry cars across a bay. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a rowboat.
🚗 Cars drive onto me.
📍 I travel a fixed route

transport.question: I have a motor and two wheels, but I'm smaller than a car. I'm known for being fast. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You need a helmet when riding me.
🛣️ I often weave through traffic.
⛽ I need gas to run.

transport.question: I move underground and carry many people, stopping at stations along the way. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You often need a ticket to ride me.
🌃 I'm common in big cities.
💡 I am powered by electricity.

transport.question: I launch into space, but I'm not an airplane. I carry astronauts to the moon, and beyond. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need a lot of fuel to launch.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts live and work inside of me.
🌌 I explore planets.

transport.question: I am a large vehicle used for public transport, but I can bend in the middle. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a regular bus.
🤝 The bending allows me to turn sharp corners.
🅿️ I can carry more passengers than a standard bus.

transport.question: I am a type of train that runs on a single rail, often elevated above the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ My name includes the word 'mono'.
🚝 I am often used in airports or amusement parks.
⬆️ I help reduce ground traffic.

transport.question: I use sails to move across the water, relying on the wind. I can be small for racing, or large for cruising. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ My movement depends on nature
⚓ I don't need an engine.
🗺️ I am fun for holidays.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet and sticky
🍯 People like to eat what I make
🐝 I live in a hive with my family

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my food. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs
🕷️ I am not an insect
🏠 My web is my home

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and turn into something beautiful that can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I am young
🌈 I have colorful wings
🦋 I go through a big change called metamorphosis

bug.question: I march in long lines, and I'm super strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony
💪 I can carry things much heavier than myself
🧺 I work together with my friends

bug.question: I chirp loudly on hot summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am active at night
🎶 Only the males sing
🌳 I live in trees

bug.question: I light up at night. People like to catch me in jars. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 My light is called bioluminescence
🌟 I am also known as a lightning bug
🪲 I am actually a beetle

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I can look like a leaf or a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 My camouflage helps me hide from predators
🌳 I am long and skinny
🍃 You might not see me if I am on a tree

bug.question: I jump very high and I have powerful back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat plants
💚 I am usually green
🎻 Some people think I sound like a violin when I 'sing'

bug.question: I’m a flying insect with transparent wings. I eat smaller insects, even my own kind. What am I?

hints.text: 🐉 I am named after a mythical creature
🧚 I am often seen near water
👁️ I have excellent eyesight

bug.question: I’m a beetle known for my bright colors and spots, bringing good luck to some. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red with black spots
🐞 I eat aphids, which are pests on plants
🌱 Gardeners like me very much
